definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: They will charge you fifty dollars for a half-hour, and you won't be able to windsurf.
sentences.chinese: 他們半小時收費五十元，你根柢衝不起來。

sentences.english: The truth is, the man's not worth a hill of beans.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這小我根柢一錢不值。

sentences.english: His visit to Paris was certainly not roaring success.
sentences.chinese: 他的巴黎之行根柢不勝利。

sentences.english: In Afghanistan, there have been no countermeasure, and munication technology at all.
sentences.chinese: 正在阿富汗，根柢講沒有上甚麼電子對抗戰通信足藝。

sentences.english: It was early on a Sunday morning and the Americans had no warning.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個星期天的清晨，美國根柢沒有取得申飭。

sentences.english: With the water pollution going on someday we shall die with no water to drink at all.
sentences.chinese: 水淨化對總有一天我們會必生出有水喝的根柢。

sentences.english: But to nail fast, it should grasp two root in their skills.
sentences.chinese: 但是要釘得牢，就應把握兩個根柢技巧。

sentences.english: If want to study abroad demand, roots of these programs is to provide in.
sentences.chinese: 假如要需求出國留學的，根柢這些程序都是要預備的。

sentences.english: Playing mahjong as a person, need a few roots of in their essence.
sentences.chinese: 打麻將跟做人一樣，需要幾個根柢的實質。

sentences.english: The foundation of every nation is the education of its youth.
sentences.chinese: 對年輕冉材蕉蔟是每個國家的根柢。

definition: that being the case/then/in that case
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
old learning/Chinese traditional teaching as opposed to material from the West
recently/until now/up to the present/lately/also written 爾來|尔来
to study/to probe/to research and examine
